alert.note: Alert for Coastal Bay; Coastal Franklin; South Walton (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Rip Current Statement issued March 29 at 2:43AM EDT until April 01 at 11:00PM EDT by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...HIGH RIP CURRENT RISK IN EFFECT FROM THIS EVENING THROUGH FRIDAY EVENING... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 2 PM EDT /1 PM CDT/ WEDNESDAY TO 10 AM EDT /9 AM CDT/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...For the High Surf Advisory, large breaking waves of 5 to 9 feet expected in the surf zone. For the High Rip Current Risk, dangerous rip currents expected. * WHERE...Walton, Bay, and Franklin County Beaches. * WHEN...For the High Surf Advisory, from 2 PM EDT /1 PM CDT/ Wednesday to 10 AM EDT /9 AM CDT/ Friday. For the High Rip Current Risk, from this evening through Friday evening. * IMPACTS...Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and localized beach erosion. Rip currents can sweep even the best swimmers away from shore into deeper water.
info.instruction: Inexperienced swimmers should remain out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions. Swim near a lifeguard. If caught in a rip current, relax and float. Don`t swim against the current. If able, swim in a direction following the shoreline. If unable to escape, face the shore and call or wave for help.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Bay; Coastal Franklin; South Walton
